name: Dell Inspiron 3525 AMD Ryzen 3 (15.6 inch, 8GB, 256GB, Windows 11, MS Office 2021, AMD Radeon, FHD, Platinum Silver, D560831WIN9SE)

prod_desc.heading: Why Buy Dell Inspiron 3525 AMD Ryzen 3
features: AMD Ryzen 3 Dual Core Processor for smooth multitasking.
8GB RAM for efficient operating of the laptop
256GB SSD that allows large storage capacity for various files
AMD Radeon AMD Graphics to enhance the video experience.
sub_features: Step a notch higher to gain a better work and gaming experience with the Dell Inspiron 3525 AMD Ryzen 3. Having a powerful AMD Ryzen 3 Dual Core provides quicker instructions to the laptop to complete multiple tasks at hand. To enhance your gaming experience, AMD Radeon AMD Graphics serves as a perfect platform to elevate your gaming playtime with better graphics and less lag time. Having 8GB RAM, it allows stored data to be received and read almost instantaneously.

Additionally, the Dell Inspiron 3525 AMD Ryzen 3's price is an added advantage. The 256GB SSD of the gaming laptop ensures that you have ample space to store any and every kind of file. Be it games or high-definition movies, pictures, and music. Store it all without jostling for space. The speakers give a crisp sound effect. So, whether playing a game, watching a movie, or listening to a song, never miss a beat or an action effect. This laptop comes with a 15.6-inch screen that proves sufficient clarity for your viewing needs. Sleek and built for practicality, the laptop serves as an ideal work and lifestyle notebook. Buy this laptop and enjoy not only the professional experience but the miscellaneous multimedia features that come bundled with it! So, what are you waiting for? Go get the Dell Inspiron 3525 AMD Ryzen 3 online today!

faqs.que: How long do Dell laptops usually last?
faqs.ans: Most experts estimate a laptop's lifespan to be three to five years. It may survive longer than that, but its utility will be limited as the components become less capable of running advanced applications.

faqs.que: How many years Dell battery lasts?
faqs.ans: When Should I Consider Replacing the Battery? All rechargeable batteries wear out with time and usage. As time and cumulative use increase, the performance will degrade. For the typical user, noticeable reduction in run time generally will be observed after 18 to 24 months.

faqs.que: At what percentage should I charge my Dell laptop?
faqs.ans: The recommended charging time should not exceed 1 hour. Typically, this should charge the battery to between 80% and 100%. (Some discharge will take place over time.)

faqs.que: How do I keep my laptop battery healthy?
faqs.ans: Like all batteries, lithium-ion cells age and deteriorate over time and with use. To help extend battery life and performance, try to keep the battery level between 20% and 80% several times a week instead of using your device for only a short amount of time, and then plugging it in to recharge the battery.
